page.title: 09Poringland Entertaiment
page.content: We spoke to a lady, and her daughter aged 8.She said she would like a sport centre, but it would be too expensive to join.The mother said that there was no sort of centre where entertaiment can take place.Apart from a youth club which takes place in the village.There is not a lot of entertaiment in Poringland.The village hall seems the main point for entertaiment.Every day there is a playgroup for young children.There is entertaiment almost every night from Bingo on Mondays to Girl Guides on Fridays.Every year Poringland First School has a sports day.The events range from dribbling a football to netball.There are plans for a new sports-social centre,to be built on charity land.
